'''''The Flowing Primal Flame''''' is part of {{Quest|The Tonatiuh Quivers}}.

==Steps==
# Go to the upper level of the floating island in the northwest to retrieve the Firestone(s)
# Retrieve the Firestone(s) on the upper level of the northwestern floating island
# Bring the Firestone(s) back to the Altar
#* {{Enemy|Secret Source Automaton: Hunter-Seeker|x=1}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* While it is intended to reach the island by jumping from the bridge while it is rotating, it can also be reached by climbing from below.
* Defeating the Secret Source Automaton: Hunter-Seeker rewards {{Item|Precious Chest|x=1}}<!-- Not marked on Teyvat Interactive Map -->
